text:
Ah, I timed it to coincide with that.
I wanted to chat with you for a bit.

Well then, that would mean it's
outside of my working hours.
Haha, don't say it like that...!

...Seems like things are going smoothly, huh?
I heard feedback from the trainer too.

How about it?  Are you starting to
feel like you're really becoming an idol?

I suppose that's something I'll never experience...
...Others might not understand, but I do.

Good work.
I'll take my leave now.
